English: Welcome to Nine Chronicles world!
Korean: Welcome to Nine Chronicles world!

English: We draws a northern fantasy RPG world based on "Blockchain Network".
Korean: We draws a northern fantasy RPG world based on "Blockchain Network".

English: - Game data will be stored in Blocks -
Korean: - Game data will be stored in Blocks -

English: Nine Chronicles stores game data on a long chain of blocks called <Blockchain>.
Korean: Nine Chronicles stores game data on a long chain of blocks called <Blockchain>.

English: Blockchain means Nine Chronicles is a fully decentralized game and powered by the players.
Korean: Blockchain means Nine Chronicles is a fully decentralized game and powered by the players.

English: Intro is over. Create your avatar first.
Korean: Intro is over. Create your avatar first.

English: Let's Create your Character!
Korean: Let's Create your Character!

English: We designed all 4 classes, but the Warrior is only availlable currently. Warrior is a melee. sturdy unit and deals massive critical damage with his/her combo system.
Korean: We designed all 4 classes, but the Warrior is only availlable currently. Warrior is a melee. sturdy unit and deals massive critical damage with his/her combo system.

English: I will introduce combo system later. The Warrior class is chosen basically, customize your avatar as your favor. Start your imagination!
Korean: I will introduce combo system later. The Warrior class is chosen basically, customize your avatar as your favor. Start your imagination!

English: Here is Main Lobby
Korean: Here is Main Lobby

English: This is the very fast of your 9c journey. (9c means Nine Chronicles) Now you are able to perform some certain actions.
Korean: This is the very fast of your 9c journey. (9c means Nine Chronicles) Now you are able to perform some certain actions.

English: Battle action requires the Action Point[comma] is also known as Stamina and is essential resource to unlock many game features. Click the warp panel on the bottom right.
Korean: Battle action requires the Action Point[comma] is also known as Stamina and is essential resource to unlock many game features. Click the warp panel on the bottom right.

English: WORLD MAP
Korean: WORLD MAP

English: 9c world is a fantasy RPG world based on Norse mythology. By Loki's accidental disguise[comma] the world’s primal quintessence is divided into 9 pieces and scattered all over the world. Goddess Freya requested you to collect all the pieces and make the primal quintessence perfect.
Korean: 9c world is a fantasy RPG world based on Norse mythology. By Loki's accidental disguise, the world’s primal quintessence is divided into 9 pieces and scattered all over the world. Goddess Freya requested you to collect all the pieces and make the primal quintessence perfect.

English: Yggdrasil
Korean: Yggdrasil

English: Yggdrasil is the mighty world-tree whose trunk rises at the center of the 9c universe.
Korean: Yggdrasil is the mighty world-tree whose trunk rises at the center of the 9c universe.

English: Yggdrasil is the starting point of your 9c journey. At a first glance[comma] monsters are cute and adorable[comma] but their teeth and claws have no mercy. You must adapt in this place.
Korean: Yggdrasil is the starting point of your 9c journey. At a first glance[comma] monsters are cute and adorable[comma] but their teeth and claws have no mercy. You must adapt in this place.

English: Prepare for Battle
Korean: Prepare for Battle

English: <color=red>HP[newline]ATK[newline]DEF[newline]CRI[newline]HIT[newline]SPD</color>
Korean: <color=red>HP[newline]ATK[newline]DEF[newline]CRI[newline]HIT[newline]SPD</color>

English: is health point and can be boosted with <color=red>Armor</color>[newline]is attack power and is determined by <color=red>Weapon</color>[newline]is defense power and is powered by pair of <color=red>Rings</color>[newline]is attack critical rate and is boosted by <color=red>Consumables</color>[newline]is attack accuracy and depends on <color=red>Amulet</color>[newline]is attack speed and is carried with <color=red>Belt</color>
Korean: is health point and can be boosted with <color=red>Armor</color>[newline]is attack power and is determined by <color=red>Weapon</color>[newline]is defense power and is powered by pair of <color=red>Rings</color>[newline]is attack critical rate and is boosted by <color=red>Consumables</color>[newline]is attack accuracy and depends on <color=red>Amulet</color>[newline]is attack speed and is carried with <color=red>Belt</color>

English: Auto battle & Combo system
Korean: Auto battle & Combo system

English: Battle will be automatically processed. Warrior is a melee[comma] sturdy unit and deals massive critical damage with his/her combo system.
Korean: Battle will be automatically processed. Warrior is a melee[comma] sturdy unit and deals massive critical damage with his/her combo system.

English: First Hit has no bonus but if the combo is chained[comma] damage and critical rate is highly increasing. Level 1~10 Warrior deals 100% damage at first hit[comma] deals 200% damage with +25% critical at last hit.
Korean: First Hit has no bonus but if the combo is chained[comma] damage and critical rate is highly increasing. Level 1~10 Warrior deals 100% damage at first hit[comma] deals 200% damage with +25% critical at last hit.

English: Interfaces
Korean: Interfaces

English: 1. Character’s EXP[comma] HP[newline]2. Stage Difficulty[newline]3. Quest[newline]4. Combo Chained[newline]5. Battlefield[newline]6. Bottom Menu[newline]7. Battle Progress Meter[newline]8. Repeat Current Stage (Toggle)
Korean: 1. Character’s EXP[comma] HP[newline]2. Stage Difficulty[newline]3. Quest[newline]4. Combo Chained[newline]5. Battlefield[newline]6. Bottom Menu[newline]7. Battle Progress Meter[newline]8. Repeat Current Stage (Toggle)

English: Stage Clear
Korean: Stage Clear

English: You can receive stage reward as your ★Star progresses.[newline][newline]S0: Fail - Grants 30% of EXP (based on stage difficulty)[newline]S1: Good - Grants 100% of EXP (based on stage difficulty)[newline]S2: Great - Grants material items (based on stage info)[newline]S3: Perfect - Unlocks next stage
Korean: You can receive stage reward as your ★Star progresses.[newline][newline]S0: Fail - Grants 30% of EXP (based on stage difficulty)[newline]S1: Good - Grants 100% of EXP (based on stage difficulty)[newline]S2: Great - Grants material items (based on stage info)[newline]S3: Perfect - Unlocks next stage

English: Welcome to Combination System!
Korean: Welcome to Combination System!

English: Nine Chronicles' combination system performs features to create certain items[comma] including powerful equipment items.[newline][newline]When the combination performs[comma] you need to wait a certain period of times and the equipment item will be given via mailbox. (Mailbox icon is on the bottom menu)
Korean: Nine Chronicles' combination system performs features to create certain items[comma] including powerful equipment items.[newline][newline]When the combination performs[comma] you need to wait a certain period of times and the equipment item will be given via mailbox. (Mailbox icon is on the bottom menu)

English: Here is the Workshop Panel
Korean: Here is the Workshop Panel

English: You can combine multiple items up to 4 at the same time. No more item combinations can be added until any of items’ work is done.[newline][newline]Remaining blocks are also shown as the image[comma] and you can use Hourglass to accelerate remaining blocks.
Korean: You can combine multiple items up to 4 at the same time. No more item combinations can be added until any of items’ work is done.[newline][newline]Remaining blocks are also shown as the image[comma] and you can use Hourglass to accelerate remaining blocks.

English: Action power and Prosperity meter
Korean: Action power and Prosperity meter

English: Action power is the essential resource to play the stage. You can refill your Action power by using the Prosperity meter.[newline][newline]The Prosperity meter can refill Action power. You must gain 1700 Prosperity to activate. It takes 7 hours in the real-time world for the meter is fully recovered.
Korean: Action power is the essential resource to play the stage. You can refill your Action power by using the Prosperity meter.[newline][newline]The Prosperity meter can refill Action power. You must gain 1700 Prosperity to activate. It takes 7 hours in the real-time world for the meter is fully recovered.

English: Here is the Mail Panel
Korean: Here is the Mail Panel

English: All your mails are collected in the mail panel. You can receive rewards here including your workshop requests.[newline][newline]You can also use the mail panel during the battle[comma] but if you want to change your equipment[comma] you must exit the battle.
Korean: All your mails are collected in the mail panel. You can receive rewards here including your workshop requests.[newline][newline]You can also use the mail panel during the battle[comma] but if you want to change your equipment[comma] you must exit the battle.

English: Here is the Quest Panel
Korean: Here is the Quest Panel

English: Play the quest. Claim the rewards. Quest is the keystone of your 9c journey[comma] reach the 9 pieces and make the primal quintessence perfect.[newline][newline]And save us.. Our Terra..
Korean: Play the quest. Claim the rewards. Quest is the keystone of your 9c journey[comma] reach the 9 pieces and make the primal quintessence perfect.[newline][newline]And save us.. Our Terra..

English: Connect your community
Korean: Connect your community

English: We operate Nine Chronicles Discord server and you can connect your community in our little[comma] fantasy RPG world.
Korean: We operate Nine Chronicles Discord server and you can connect your community in our little[comma] fantasy RPG world.

English: Here is the Character Panel
Korean: Here is the Character Panel

English: You can change equipment items here.[newline][newline]Empower your character! As your equipment item’s pool is increasing[comma] your character’s stat will increase too. Stat is very important in the battle.
Korean: You can change equipment items here.[newline][newline]Empower your character! As your equipment item’s pool is increasing[comma] your character’s stat will increase too. Stat is very important in the battle.

English: Game Settings
Korean: Game Settings

English: You can save your address and private key here.[newline][newline]Please do not show this code anyone.[newline][newline]Operator NEVER requests the secret code.
